# Welcome Back

<br> Welcome Back to the Introduction to R at FHFA Class!

- **Step 1:** Remember to please clone the class materials from [GitHub](https://github.com/christopherdavisw/intro-to-r). 

- **Step 2:** Open up the website by going to [this link](https://christopherdavisw.github.io/intro-to-r/). 

- **Step 3:** Separately, open up the `intro-to-r.Rproj` file to open up the R project related to this class. 

## Recap

- Assignment with `<-`
- Vectors 
  - `numeric`
    - `integer` and `double`
  - `character`
  - `logical`
- Data Frames and `tibble`
- `dplyr Basics` 
  - `mutate()`: create new or modify existing variable 
  - `filter()`: remove observations
  - `select()`: remove, rename, or order columns
  - `arrange()`: sort by row
  - `group_by()`: group data
  - `summarise()`: summarize data by group
- THe `|>` pipe operator
